entry.title: Animated Bible Story of Built Upon The Rock On DVD

media:group.media:title: Animated Bible Story of Built Upon The Rock On DVD
media:group.media:description:
Animated Bible Story of Built Upon The Rock On DVD
Enrich your children's lives with the most popular and trustworthy, animated stories from the Bible. The NEST Complete Learning System on DVD includes 36 entertaining, educational, and interactive DVDs which will help you train your kids to become spiritual champions! Our children's animated Bible stories include Jesus' most beloved Parables, the First Christmas Story, the Passion of Christ and his Jesus' Resurrection on Easter, and many more animated bible stories.
Jesus is asked to judge an inheritance dispute, but instead He uses this divisive conflict between brothers to affirm the eternal ideals of His Beatitudes which He taught in the Sermon on the Mount. Jesus teaches the wronged brother to forgive and love his brother. All who follow Jesus must learn that what we own has little to do with who we are.
Animated Bible Story of Built Upon The Rock On DVD: http://www.nestlearning.com/built-upon-the-rock-video-on-interactive-dvd_p43413.aspx

media:group.media:title: Making Investments | Bible Story | LifeKids
media:group.media:description:
A master leaves money with his servants while he goes away. When he returns, he looks at how they invested the money.
What can we learn from the Parable of the Talents? When you are faithful with God gives you, you will surely be blessed.
Matthew 25:14-30

entry.title: Animated Bible Story of the Parables of Jesus On DVD

media:group.media:title: Animated Bible Story of the Parables of Jesus On DVD
media:group.media:description:
Animated Bible Story of the Parables of Jesus On DVD
Enrich your children's lives with the most popular and trustworthy, animated stories from the Bible. The NEST Complete Learning System on DVD includes 36 entertaining, educational, and interactive DVDs which will help you train your kids to become spiritual champions! Our children's animated Bible stories include Jesus' most beloved Parables, the First Christmas Story, the Passion of Christ and his Jesus' Resurrection on Easter, and many more animated bible stories.
Jesus often taught His followers using stories called parables. Three of the best-loved parables—the Parable of the Talents, the Parable of the Rich Man and Lazarus, and the Parable of the Two Sons—arepresented together to reinforce important principles. They teach us howto be good stewards of our time and of the things that we have beengiven. In a world of self-centeredness, these timeless truths help usto focus on our faith in God and on His power to help us live our livesin accordance with His teachings.
Buy Animated Bible Story of the Parables of Jesus On DVD: http://www.nestlearning.com/the-parables-of-jesus-video-on-interactive-dvd_p42895.aspx
56 Animated Bible And History DVD Learning System Collection: http://www.nestlearning.com/56-animated-bible-and-history-dvd-learning-system-collection_p42924.aspx

Miracles of Jesus English Episodes - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL35C8BE51D0B0006A Miracles of Jesus Malayalam Episodes - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB94175BC6218AB57 Miracles of Jesus German Episodes - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0076CFB66F5741F2 Miracles of Jesus Spanish Episodes - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL482EBA4A27A58027 Miracles of Jesus Hindi Episodes - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCD625F4349CDB352

The Good Samaritan (Luke 10:25-37, Matthew 22:34-40, Mark 12:28-34)
Luke 10:25-37 25 And behold, a certain lawyer stood up and put Him to the test, saying, "Teacher, what shall I do to inherit eternal life?" 26 And He said to him, "What is written in the Law? How does it read to you?" 27 And he answered and said, "You shall love the Lord your God with all your heart, and with all your soul, and with all your strength, and with all your mind; and your neighbor as yourself." 28 And He said to him, "You have answered correctly; do this, and you will live." 29 But wishing to justify himself, he said to Jesus, "And who is my neighbor?" 30 Jesus replied and said, "A certain man was going down from Jerusalem to Jericho; and he fell among robbers, and they stripped him and beat him, and went off leaving him half dead. 31 "And by chance a certain priest was going down on that road, and when he saw him, he passed by on the other side. 32 "And likewise a Levite also, when he came to the place and saw him, passed by on the other side. 33 "But a certain Samaritan, who was on a journey, came upon him; and when he saw him, he felt compassion, 34 and came to him, and bandaged up his wounds, pouring oil and wine on them; and he put him on his own beast, and brought him to an inn, and took care of him. 35 "And on the next day he took out two denarii and gave them to the innkeeper and said, 'Take care of him; and whatever more you spend, when I return, I will repay you.' 36 "Which of these three do you think proved to be a neighbor to the man who fell into the robbers' hands?" 37 And he said, "The one who showed mercy toward him." And Jesus said to him, "Go and do the same."

entry.title: Children's animated Bible Stories - WILD STORIES ABOUT JESUS

media:group.media:title: Children's animated Bible Stories - WILD STORIES ABOUT JESUS
media:group.media:description:
Children's animated Bible Stories - WILD STORIES ABOUT JESUS. 32 short wild stories about Jesus from Jesus birith, baptism, ministry, parables, death, resurrection and ascension. Produced by the Bible Society of Australia. Enjoy! Children's animated Bible Stories - WILD STORIES ABOUT JESUS.
Childrens animated Bible Stories start with a quick sum up on Jesus life. Then Childrens animated Bible Stories moves on into the story of Jesus Birth, the Shepherds and the Wisemen. Then Childrens animated Bible stories moves onto the introducing John the Baptist and John baptising Jesus and Jesus is tested in the desert by satan. Then Childrens animated Bible Stories has Jesus calling his disciples - Peter, Andrew, James and John to follow Jesus. Then Childrens Animated Bible Stories has Jesus healing ministry and the Jewish leaders opposing Jesus and questioning HIm. Then Childrens Animated Bible Stories has the Kingdom Parables - like the Sower Parable. Then Childrens Animated Bible Stories has some more miracles and teachings of Jesus, like not to worry, the lost sheep parable, the prodical son, the good Samaritan story. Then Childrens Animated Bible Stories tells the story of the feeding of the 4000 men. Then Childrens animated Bible Stories has the blind man who Jesus spake into his eyes and he is miraculously healed. Then Childrens animated Bible Stories has Jesus prophesying His own death and resurrection followed by His Jesus betrayal by Judas Iscariot. Then Childrens animated Bible stories has Jesus arrested and crucified. Then Childrens animated Bible Stories has Jesus resurrection and finally ascension with His disciples preaching the gospel and signs and wonders following. Enjoy! Childrens animated Bible Stories - Wild Stories about Jesus

The Good Samaritan (Luke 10:25-37, Matthew 22:34-40, Mark 12:28-34)
Luke 10:25-37 25 And behold, a certain lawyer stood up and put Him to the test, saying, "Teacher, what shall I do to inherit eternal life?" 26 And He said to him, "What is written in the Law? How does it read to you?" 27 And he answered and said, "You shall love the Lord your God with all your heart, and with all your soul, and with all your strength, and with all your mind; and your neighbor as yourself." 28 And He said to him, "You have answered correctly; do this, and you will live." 29 But wishing to justify himself, he said to Jesus, "And who is my neighbor?" 30 Jesus replied and said, "A certain man was going down from Jerusalem to Jericho; and he fell among robbers, and they stripped him and beat him, and went off leaving him half dead. 31 "And by chance a certain priest was going down on that road, and when he saw him, he passed by on the other side. 32 "And likewise a Levite also, when he came to the place and saw him, passed by on the other side. 33 "But a certain Samaritan, who was on a journey, came upon him; and when he saw him, he felt compassion, 34 and came to him, and bandaged up his wounds, pouring oil and wine on them; and he put him on his own beast, and brought him to an inn, and took care of him. 35 "And on the next day he took out two denarii and gave them to the innkeeper and said, 'Take care of him; and whatever more you spend, when I return, I will repay you.' 36 "Which of these three do you think proved to be a neighbor to the man who fell into the robbers' hands?" 37 And he said, "The one who showed mercy toward him." And Jesus said to him, "Go and do the same."

entry.title: Parables Of Jesus | Stories of Jesus I Animated Children's Bible Stories | Holy Tales Bible Stories

media:group.media:title: Parables Of Jesus | Stories of Jesus I Animated Children's Bible Stories | Holy Tales Bible Stories
media:group.media:description:
Parables Of Jesus is an animated children’s Bible compilation about the Parables that embody the fundamental teachings of Jesus, simple to understand and perfect for instilling the right morals in young minds. https://youtu.be/yVx0NbUSF0U?list=PLXnXq48dJ0W92Ycp5PgF3eAxYvrwcr0R9
The Good Samaritan 1:00
The Farmer And The Seeds 2:59
The Lost Sheep 5:27
The Lost Coin Is Found 7:47
The Two Brothers 9:18
The Lost Son Returns 11:24
The Ploughman 13:31
Leaven And Dough 15:37
Using Our Talents Well 17:37
Rich Man And Lazarus 19:48
A Good Guest 22:13
The Real Guests 24:23
Workers In The Vineyard 26:26
The Kingdom of Heaven 28:44
The Unjust Judge 30:55
Old Holy tells kids animated Holy Tales from The Bible. The Holy Tales: Bible Stories is the channel that can teach your children about all Christian Bible stories through animations, songs, nursery rhymes in a fun joyful learning process. As a parent, you can trust our animated characters to keep your kids entertained and educated about Christianity. Discover timeless religious stories such as: The Garden of Eden, The Life of Jesus Christ, The Creation, Adam & Eve, The Old Testament, The Book of Genesis, Stories of Solomon, Stories about the Israelites, Stories of David, The Book of Samuel, Stories of Joseph, Stories of Jacob, Stories of Moses, The Book of Exodus as well as Christmas bedtime stories, singalongs, nursery rhymes by The Hippy Hoppy Show. We hope you enjoy our world of children's animated Bible stories. Learn more about us at: http://my.ifood.tv/theholytalesbiblestories.
We upload a new video every Friday but don't forget to subscribe to stay up to date with our latest videos and special video previews. Participate in the Holy Tales community by commenting on our videos and sharing. Join hands with our parents and children to acknowledge the wonders of Bible stories.
Watching The Holy Tales: Bible will turn parents and children into Happy Kids. Parents subscribe, kids love!
Check for new video uploads every Friday and Saturday. Like our page on Facebook to keep up with the latest news from Holy Tales: https://www.facebook.com/TheHolyTales Visit our website: http://www.happykids.tv Find us on Roku: https://channelstore.roku.com/#!details/39759/the-holy-tales-bible Like our Happy Kids page on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/happykids.tv Find your happy kid: https://www.youtube.com/user/HappyKidsOfficial Subscribe, comment and share! :)

entry.title: Animated Bible Story of Lord I Believe On DVD

media:group.media:title: Animated Bible Story of Lord I Believe On DVD
media:group.media:description:
Animated Bible Story of Lord I Believe On DVD
Enrich your children's lives with the most popular and trustworthy, animated stories from the Bible. The NEST Complete Learning System on DVD includes 36 entertaining, educational, and interactive DVDs which will help you train your kids to become spiritual champions! Our children's animated Bible stories include Jesus' most beloved Parables, the First Christmas Story, the Passion of Christ and his Jesus' Resurrection on Easter, and many more animated bible stories.
Lord, I Believe is a collection of three stories on DVD where Jesus teaches His disciples the power of faith. First, a kind Roman centurion kneels before the Master and pleads for his dying servant. The servant is healed because he asked in faith nothing doubting. Saying "weep not," Jesus raises the son of the poor widow of Nain. Lastly, a man with weak faith begs the Master to make his son whole. Jesus answers, " all things are possible to him that believeth," and heals the child.
Animated Bible Story of Lord I Believe On DVD: http://www.nestlearning.com/lord-i-believe-video-on-interactive-dvd_p42861.aspx
56 Animated Bible And History DVD Learning System Collection: http://www.nestlearning.com/56-animated-bible-and-history-dvd-learning-system-collection_p42924.aspx

entry.title: Gospel of Jesus Christ - Rhyming children's movie - Bible story for beginners

media:group.media:title: Gospel of Jesus Christ - Rhyming children's movie - Bible story for beginners
media:group.media:description: "Oh this Jesus" -- The complete rhyming story of the life of Jesus as told through the Biblical gospels of Matthew, Mark, Luke, and John. Includes scenes from Joseph and Mary, The Birth of Jesus, Parables, Jesus Walking on Water, The Sermon on the mount, The Prodigal Son, and much more. From www.OhThisJesus.com

entry.title: Bible Stories for Kids: The Story of the Prodigal Son

media:group.media:title: Bible Stories for Kids: The Story of the Prodigal Son
media:group.media:description: n animated retelling of Jesus' parable about a headstrong son who decides to travel to the city rather than work on his father's farm. When the young man wants to return to the farm, he fears a stern rebuke from his father, but instead is welcomed back with open arms. Theme song performed by Kathie Lee Gifford., Performers include: Kathie Lee Gifford.
